title: Plot Huber vs Ridge
description: In this lab, we will compare the performance of two regression models, HuberRegressor and Ridge, on a dataset with strong outliers. We will generate a toy dataset, add strong outliers to it, and then fit both models to the dataset. We will visualize the results and compare the performance of the models.

meta.title: Comparing Huber and Ridge Regression Models
meta.description: Explore the performance of Huber and Ridge regression models on a dataset with strong outliers.
meta.keywords: ridge regression, huber regression, machine learning, machine learning playground, scikit-learn, outlier detection, data analysis, scikit-learn playground, regression modeling
